values.name: Off The Fence Trust Limited

values: Tackling poverty, addiction, mental health issues
advocacy, housing and health referrals, mentoring
education and welfare for schools pupils

values.description:
Off The Fence have been working since 1994 in the City of Brighton & Hove with three areas of the community to provide one to one care and help. 
   Our drop in centre for the homeless, Antifreeze offers a place where rough sleepers can chat, find a sleeping bag, wash, get clothes and food, have a haircut and receive health care treatments from specialists, such as the dentist. Antifreeze also refer clients to housing and hostels, and helps rough sleepers come off the streets. Nightly our outreach teams monitor the rough sleeper’s welfare and any newcomers to the City, providing immediate information and sign posting that allows a quick exit from street life. 
The Women's centre, Gateway was set up to provide a place where women facing difficult times due to abuse, mental health issues or just generally struggling could find friendship, advice and support that will enable them to change and have stability in their lives. Gateway’s drop in centre offers a safe place where women can learn new skills, be listened to and referred to relevant agencies and support networks. 
The Schools Team run a ‘Building Healthy Relationships’ course, helping students who have found interaction with others difficult. Lunch time clubs provide a ‘safe space’ where young people who find it hardest to deal with school life have found a place of safety. In conjunction with the head teachers we also offer one to one counselling, mentoring and a full range of professional secondary school activities.

values.name: PSG Financial Solutions Limited
values.description:
From our South Coast home of Brighton & Hove, across Sussex, the South East and up to the City of London, PSG Financial Solutions Limited offer comprehensive Independent Financial Advice for both individual and business clients.

We take a holistic approach to financial planning, gaining a complete understanding of an individual or business’ current financial situation, and goals for the future, with an emphasis on creating and preserving wealth.

We aim to build strong, long standing relationships with our clients and work with their other professional advisers, such as accountants and solicitors, to ensure that by working as a team we achieve the best outcome for our mutual clients.

For over 40 years, Pavilion Electrics has been serving customers in Brighton, Hove and Sussex. An NICEIC Approved Contractor and Domestic Installer, the company has worked on some of the biggest commercial and industrial projects in the South East, at the same time serving its loyal customer base of homeowners and local businesses

Lighting design, LED lighting and much more

Not only does Pavilion Electrics offer the full range of electrical services from fault finding and repair to major rewires and installation. The company's years of experience and expertise across lighting and electrical allows it to suggest energy-saving lighting and power solutions, as well as offer a lighting design service. Allow Pavilion Electrics to help transform your home, office or retail space with the latest in lighting technology and design.

Reliable and trusted electricians

Pavilion Electrics prides itself on its reputation over its 40 years built by keeping the customer the focus in everything it does. The company places the customer's needs first and foremost and aims to work around them and the highest standards of customer service and after-care are paramount. Of course, all Pavilion Electrics work is fully insured and guaranteed, and the company's engineers will work hard to minimise disruption to your home or office leaving it as clean and tidy as they found it.
values.name: Pavilion Electrics

values.description:
Brighton and Hove's first short term house sitting service. Individuals frustrated with the inconveniences placed on them to wait at home for a delivery or tradesperson/engineers arrival can book The Home Cover Company by the hour to instead wait for them. 

Waiting at home causes disruptions at work, loss of earnings and time wasted. Most individuals resort to using valuable holiday, or unpaid leave - now a simple solution is in place where a short term house sitter can be used. All sitters are police checked, employed directly by us, insured and fully vetted/referenced.

Businesses and companies employees lose over 13 million days holidays each year waiting at home for deliveries and workpersons. The Home Cover Company can act as a signal of a companies investment in its staff and their well being by simply endorsing the service. Companies productivity and structures can be affected by this time away as well so the positives for both employee and employer can clearly be seen.

Businesses which rely on deliveing to customers or those that need to carry out work at the home of their customers will also benefit by either using The Home Cover Company to add value for their customer or by aiding in overcoming the difficulties associated with finding a convenient time for both parties.

The Home Cover Company also will enable private landlords to use the service for enabling all their access needs. So when the landlord can not be at the home then The Home Cover Company can.
values.name: The Home Cover Company

Kvinnherad kommune
values.description:
Kvinnherad kommune er ein allsidig arbeidsplass som fleire år har vunne prisar for fokus på arbeidsmiljøet. Hos oss arbeider 1300 flinke folk, men vi treng stadig nye medarbeidarar. Alle våre ledige stillingar finn du på https://jobb.kvinnherad.kommune.no/recruitment

Kvinnherad er kjent for festivalar, lang strandlinje, høge fjell, Søral, Folgefonna og høg kulturfaktor. I tillegg har vi næringsliv m.a. knytt mot oljenæring og livbåtproduksjon. Det gjev varierte høve for arbeid og fritid i ein fantastisk natur med god kommunikasjon til Bergen, Stavanger, Haugesund og Oslo.

Kvinnherad har vel 13.000 innbyggjarar og ligg i Sunnhordland. Kommunen har gode skule- og barnehagetilbod, bustadtomter i mest kvar bygd og moderne leiligheiter. Rosendal er administrativt senter og Husnes har eit av dei største handlesentra i regionen. På Husnes ligg også Kvinnherad vidaregåande skule.

Næringslivet spenner frå primærnæringar, via tradisjonell industri til høgteknologiske bedrifter med sterk internasjonal satsing. Internasjonalt er også skuleverket: Utvekslingsprogram i grunnskulen og utanlandspraksis i vidaregåande.

We truly give you more than just Searches - we help Solicitors and Conveyancing firms throughout the UK to increase their business. Searches UK are located in central Hove, East Sussex and have been trading for over 4 years. We are already established as one of the top conveyancing search providers in England and Wales.

Our expertise within the Conveyancing Search industry is wide and covers all aspects of Residential and Commercial Searches, including Official Local Authority Searches (also known as Council Local Authority Searches, Personal Local Authority Searches (also known as Regulated Local Authority Searches), Environmental Searches, Chancel Searches, Mining Searches, Company Searches and many others besides.

As members and subscribers to IPSA and COPSO Search Standards of Practice, Searches UK operates an overarching philosophy to provide Solicitors and Conveyancers throughout the UK with Conveyancing Searches that are:

Professional, Full Data Searches and covered by our comprehensive Indemnity Insurance for your peace of mind :

Competitively priced
Supplied with a fast and first class service, so that you’re not kept waiting
Backed by our friendly customer care team for full before, during and after sales support
Provided in a manner that suits you – we can supply your Conveyancing Searches to you via our on-line case management system, e-mail, fax or as postal hard copies
values.name: Searches UK

We are looking for all past students and staff to join our alumni group.

Guide2Brighton.com is everything you need to know about Brighton and Hove from  Accommodation, Restaurants, Property, Events, Discount Vouchers, Community site, Guide and Business Listings.
 
Not only do we give you all this we have our awesome news section which keeps you up to date with everything fun that’s going on in Brighton, as well as reviewing everything that’s worth going to in Brighton by our ever so lovely journalists, who are always out and about, if you see them say Hi!
 
We don’t report any doom and gloom that’s going on in Brighton, only fun and happiness here.
 
If you would like someone to come down to write about your event, restaurant, club night or anything really, do get in touch and we will be happy to come down and see you.
 
Also don’t hesitate to give us a call or email if you’re stuck on what to do or where to go in Brighton, someone will always give you some sound advice to make your trip or day the best Brighton experience ever!
values.name: Guide2Brighton.com

values.description:
History 
•	Locally owned and operated since 1989
•	Awarded The Hearing Review Best of Hearing Healthcare Professionals in 2011 & 2012
•	The only Audigy Certified practice in the Northland
Our Doctors - Patients are seen by licensed/Board Certified Doctors of Audiology  
•	Dr. John Voss has been a practicing audiology since 1979 
•	Dr. Chad Kittleson received his Au.D. in May of 2012
•	Dr. Denise Hove (in Grand Rapids) has been practicing audiology since 1996
Services
•	Hearing evaluations from five years of age through adulthood
o	Appointments are conducted with the help of e-Patient, an all-digital and interactive platform that provides visual and educational support to the evaluation and counseling process
•	Hearing technology recommendations and fittings
o	Once fit with hearing aids, most patients are seen at least 3-4 times during our 75 day adjustment period    to make sure our patients are finding success
•	Device cleanings and diagnostic services performed on a regular basis for optimum performance
•	Recommendations for tinnitus management, assisted listening devices, and accessories for TV, Bluetooth connectivity, and telephone use
•	Patient advocacy and education – help patient develop awareness and management of difficult listening situations/scenarios and how to find greater success in communicating
•	Community outreach – Educating staff and family at local assisted living homes on proper hearing device use and effective communication strategies.
values.name: Hearing Associates INC
